title: Love Island Australia's Sam Withers looks forlorn at Melbourne Airport
text:
He was sent home from Love Island Australia earlier this week, making him the first boot of the season.

So it was no surprise that Sam Withers looked a little downcast as he made his way through Melbourne Airport on Thursday.

The 28-year-old forced a smile as he strolled through the terminal with his luggage.

Back home: Love Island Australia's Sam Withers looked a little downcast as he made his way through Melbourne Airport on Thursday

The handsome DJ looked stylish in a Hawaiian shirt, white slacks and spectacles.

He carried a bottle of Mount Franklin water in one hand and a gold iPhone in the other.

While he looked forlorn at first, Sam appeared to perk up when he saw his friends waiting to greet him in the terminal with a large plush teddy bear.

Cheer up: The 28-year-old forced a smile as he strolled through the terminal with his luggage

That's better! The handsome DJ was beaming once he saw his friends waiting for him

How sweet: Sam's pals greeted him at the terminal with an oversized plush teddy bear

On Love Island Australia, Sam had a brief fling with Vanessa Sierra, who was coupled up with Matt Zukowski.

And despite being sent home when she chose Matt over him, Sam believes that he still has a chance with the brunette beauty.

Speaking to Daily Mail Australia on Monday, Sam said Vanessa, 24, led him to believe there could still be an attraction between them.

Thirsty? The Melbourne-based DJ was clutching a bottle of Mount Franklin water

Chit chat: Sam stopped to have a friendly conversation with his two buddies

Helping hand: Sam let his friends carry the bear while he clutched his bottle of water

'I'm happy for Vanessa and Matt, and hopefully it can work out, but I was getting told a few little things from Vanessa that there was potential there,' he said.

'There was a lot of "what if" with Vanessa, and I think we'll just have to wait and see.'

And he said he already has plans to meet up with Vanessa after the show ends, confessing he'd definitely ask her out if she emerged from the villa single.

'I have to wait and see how the rest of the show plays out for them, but myself and Vanessa are catching up after the show, 100 per cent,' he added.
description: He was sent home from Love Island Australia earlier this week, making him the first boot of the season.
